before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"972fo","text":"Surfaces in the lab should be cleaned three times. Once with warm water and starch-free detergent, then with 5% NaOH, followed by a final cleaning with distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhvuu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8ai0","text":"Saliva donor criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjovm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f98i0","text":"Must have no/limited history of dental caries","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc39v","text":" Must not have used antibiotics in the past 6 months","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"156me","text":"Abstain from oral hygiene 24 hours prior to donation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e65f8","text":"Refrain from eating and drinking (except water) 2 hours before donation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9gg2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66be6","text":"For experiments involving starches, donors should avoid eating starch-containing foods on the day of donation. description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b7m66","text":"This is the main protocol to grow a calcifying oral biofilm model with starch treatments. It uses a 24 deepwell plate with the accompanying lid as substratum (polypropylene). The protocol takes 25 days to run, with daily tasks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42bk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh8ic","text":"Modified from protocols by Sissons et al. (1991) and Extercate et al. 2010.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dcc92","text":"The preferred substratum for inoculation is glass or hydroxyapatite. Plastic substrata can be used but are less effective, so surface treatment of the plastic is recommeded (e.g. heated HCl or acetone).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"91o4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"93skr","text":"Substrata should be autoclaved prior to use, both before and during the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ugmo","text":"Saliva donors rinse their mouth with water for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7r8pr","text":"Stimulate saliva production by chewing tasteless gum or parafilm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emka8","text":"Collect the saliva by spitting into 50 ml plastic centrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eirre","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dbsaa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3oejm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8r02a","text":"Make sure donors wear gloves to avoid contamination with non-oral bacteria.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed5e2","text":"Make a 2-fold dilution of saliva in sterile   and vortex the solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5mdtm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4E755EE0BE2E11EBB9E1457714C337EA","id":"9837","label":"glycerol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"64l7p","text":"Before inoculation, vortex the saliva solution again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ftei","text":"Pipette the saliva solution into the wells, so approx. 1-2 cm of the substratum is submerged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"tk0r","text":"Place the plate in the incubator at 36ºC for 4 hours for static inoculation   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8lss1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"E8589C70BE2911EBB9E1457714C337EA","id":"82990","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
